trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGZD008_05097_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The airsick Pelupelu needs someone to walk where he cannot.
TEXT_KINGZD008_05097_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Xax Ilyik.
TEXT_KINGZD008_05097_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Bol Inen.
TEXT_KINGZD008_05097_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the samples to the airsick Pelupelu.
TEXT_KINGZD008_05097_MOTIONSICKNESS05097_000_011<tab>Ungh... <groan> You there... I have work for you, if you'll take it. I'll pay you, of course. Quite well.
TEXT_KINGZD008_05097_MOTIONSICKNESS05097_100_013<tab>I need you to collect two samples: equipment from Xax Ilyik at the Fanged Foundry, and fabric from Bol Inen at Iq Br'aax.
TEXT_KINGZD008_05097_MOTIONSICKNESS05097_000_014<tab>I can't go myself, as you can see...the damned dirigible shook like a bucking alpaca with every gust of wind. One step and I'm... Ughhh...
TEXT_KINGZD008_05097_MOTIONSICKNESS05097_000_016<tab>Once you have the samples, bring them here... I only hope I can survive to see them...

TEXT_KINGZD008_05097_XAXILYIK_000_021<tab>You're here in that merchant's stead? Well, it's all the same to me, so go ahead and take this equipment, modeled after that used by the Landsguard. I reckon it'll suffice for his “samples.”
TEXT_KINGZD008_05097_XAXILYIK_000_022<tab>And you tell him something for me. Tell him that he's ordering too much.
TEXT_KINGZD008_05097_XAXILYIK_000_023<tab>This place wasn't intended to make more than is needed by Iq Br'aax. That being said, I'm confident that what I'm giving him is of the highest quality.
TEXT_KINGZD008_05097_XAXILYIK_000_024<tab>Well, go on then. And don't you forget to deliver my message.
TEXT_KINGZD008_05097_XAXILYIK_000_025<tab>You have what you need, and now I'm sure you're eager to get paid.
TEXT_KINGZD008_05097_BOLINEN_000_031<tab>You're here on behalf of the merchant? He wanted fabric samples, if I recall. I have them ready, so you can deliver them to him directly.

TEXT_KINGZD008_05097_BOLINEN_000_032<tab>Also, be sure to pass on my apologies that I could not meet the uh...vast quantity he requested. We are a self-sufficient people, you see, and do not produce goods with a mind to sell them en masse.
TEXT_KINGZD008_05097_BOLINEN_000_034<tab>Still, I hope what I've provided meets with his satisfaction. Be well.
TEXT_KINGZD008_05097_BOLINEN_000_035<tab>I do hope the quality of the fabric makes up for the relatively small quantity.

TEXT_KINGZD008_05097_MOTIONSICKNESS05097_000_041<tab>Oh, there you are. I'm feeling much better, in case you were wondering. So, did you bring the samples? I'll have you know, I intend to count every last one of them.

TEXT_KINGZD008_05097_MOTIONSICKNESS05097_000_042<tab>Ah, beautiful! Thank you for helping this deal go smoothly. As for the quantities...well, it's unfortunate, but I'll take what I can. And I do still intend to count them, you can be sure.

TEXT_KINGZD008_05097_MOTIONSICKNESS05097_000_044<tab>Goods from Iq Br'aax are usually acquired through negotiations with the Xbr'aal. We can only purchase small amounts, and they're usually brought all the way from the village.

TEXT_KINGZD008_05097_MOTIONSICKNESS05097_000_045<tab>Their equipment is sturdy and reliable enough for hunters and soldiers alike, and their fabrics are light, breathable, and stylish. Any tribe would buy these, and in amounts approaching quadruple digits.

TEXT_KINGZD008_05097_MOTIONSICKNESS05097_000_046<tab>So that's why I added a few more zeroes to my order numbers this time. Alas, it seems I'll have to revisit my plans for mass production after I return to Tuliyollal...

TEXT_KINGZD008_05097_MOTIONSICKNESS05097_000_048<tab>Speaking of which, there's still time until the dirigible departs. I suppose I should take a walk over solid ground while I can, and try not to think of my return voyage...
TEXT_KINGZD008_05097_MOTIONSICKNESS05097_000_049<tab>Once again, thank you for aiding in a profitable deal. Not as profitable as I had hoped, mind you, but you still deserve this for your efforts.
